Datetime.description: The date and time at which the data was recorded, in the format of MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM

Temperature.description: The temperature value recorded at the given datetime, in degrees Celsius

Humidity.description: The humidity level recorded at the given datetime, in percentage (%)

WindSpeed.description: The wind speed recorded at the given datetime, in meters per second (m/s)

GeneralDiffuseFlows.description: The general diffuse flows recorded at the given datetime, unit not specified

DiffuseFlows.description: The diffuse flows recorded at the given datetime, unit not specified

PowerConsumption_Zone1.description: The power consumption in Zone 1 at the given datetime, in kilowatt-hours (kWh)

PowerConsumption_Zone2.description: The power consumption in Zone 2 at the given datetime, in kilowatt-hours (kWh)

PowerConsumption_Zone3.description: The power consumption in Zone 3 at the given datetime, in kilowatt-hours (kWh)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in energy consumption analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions and solar radiation, please predict the power consumption in Zone 1.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted power consumption in Zone 1 is _______ (kWh).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in energy consumption analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions and solar radiation, please predict the power consumption in Zone 2.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted power consumption in Zone 2 is _______ (kWh).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in energy consumption analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions and solar radiation, please predict the power consumption in Zone 3.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted power consumption in Zone 3 is _______ (kWh).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in solar radiation analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions, please predict the general diffuse flows.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted general diffuse flows are _______ (W/m²).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in solar radiation analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions, please predict the diffuse flows.
